title: Advanced Stock Trading Course
content: This course is built for persons in search of literacy whilst making consistent profit from the stock market. It is for individuals with a long term perspective with any level of risk appetite.
author: TraderHack

title: Decentralized Finance (DeFi) Course
content: This course is designed to help you understand decentralised finance and how to navigate and benefit from protocols built for DeFI on the blockchain.
author: Marvelous Macaulay

title: FOREX Trading Course
content: In this course you will learn everything you need to know to start Trading the Forex Market right now! This is not just a theoretical course, you also get to learn how to use the information to Trade Live in Real Time.
author: ABOKI
